availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Edward Barnaby (Bath County, KY, sergeant Bath Co Rangers & First Cap Guards USA)

body.p: Bath County, Kentucky, soldier. Served in Captain Busseyâ€™s Bath County Rangers as a sergeant from December 11, 1863, to April 1, 1864. Served in the First Regiment Capital Guards, Frankfort Battalion, as a sergeant from February 1, 1864, to February 6, 1864.

ab.bibl: Report of the Adjutant General of the State of Kentucky, vol. 2, 1861-1866 (Frankfort: Kentucky Yeoman Office, 1866), 760, 887.
